Constructor Summary       smtp ()        Creates an illegal SMTP transaction.       smtp (int portNumber,   java.lang.String smtpServer,   java.lang.String toAddress,   java.lang.String fromAddress,   java.lang.String smtpMessage)        Send a message via SMTP       smtp (java.lang.String smtpServer,   java.lang.String toAddress,   java.lang.String fromAddress,   java.lang.String smtpMessage)        Send a message via SMTP using the default port.
